name: web3-data
tagline: Explore on-chain data across EVM chains via Chainbase APIs
description: A Claude Code skill for exploring Web3 on-chain data using Chainbase APIs. Supports querying token holders, address labels, token prices, NFT data, wallet analytics, DeFi portfolios, ENS domains, and custom SQL queries across Ethereum, BSC, Polygon, Arbitrum, Optimism, Base, Avalanche, zkSync, and more. Uses natural language to route queries to the right API endpoint, with SQL fallback for custom analytics.
